double computeGamma ()
 compute the single RBF coefficient gamma, which is in this context best defined as the determinant of the matrix M, squared.

Detailed Description

General Guassian Kernel.

with symmetric matrix M

In case computation speed matters, it is equivalent to linearly transform the input data according to the matrix M before applying the standard RBFKenerl with . This matrix can be determined calling getTransformation.
